speaker: SEN. BERNIE SANDERS
sentence: She voted for the War in Iraq.
verified_claim: Hillary Clinton "agreed with John McCain on voting for the war in Iraq."
verified_claim_article_title: Clinton and McCain had same vote on Iraq war

speaker: SEN. BERNIE SANDERS
sentence: I want to break up the Wall Street banks.
verified_claim: Says Hillary Clinton "couldn't bring herself to say we need to separate commercial banking and speculative banking, namely reinstating Glass-Steagall."
verified_claim_article_title: O'Malley Hillary Clinton doesn't want to reinstate Glass-Steag

speaker: SEN. BERNIE SANDERS
sentence: I want to raise the minimum wage to 15 bucks an hour.
verified_claim: When this campaign began, I said that weve got to end the starvation minimum wage of 7.25, raise it to 15. Secretary Clinton said let's raise it to 12.
verified_claim_article_title: Does Hillary Clinton want a 15 or 12 minimum wage?
